description:
There are no guarantees that you will reach a positive outcome in your legal case, no matter who represents you in Georgia. However, you significantly increase the odds by choosing an experienced law firm, like McGarity and Efstration LLC, based in Buford. Our full-service law firm has provided committed and caring legal services for residents of Greater Atlanta for the past 65 years.

Our practice areas

McGarity and Efstration LLC, is a leading personal injury firm in the Atlanta area, but our practice areas are by no means limited to that area of the law. We also handle cases in the following areas:

  • Zoning and land use litigation
  • Commercial litigation
  • Family law
  • Wills and probate
  • Criminal defense

Our proudest moments

Over the past six and a half decades, we have earned several notable awards from legal organizations and reporting agencies. We are members of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and were named the Best of Gwinnett County from 2016 to 2020.

We are even more proud of the case results we have achieved on behalf of our clients. Our law firm has recovered multimillion-dollar settlements on behalf of our clients. For example, we recovered $5 million and $4.75 million in two separate commercial trucking accidents that involved passenger vehicle victims.

Our team also takes pride in every situation where we help family members reach amicable solutions and every not-guilty verdict we attain in court. Whether our clients intend to take on a corporation, an individual or biases in the justice system, we're ready to tackle the challenges ahead.
